text: Ihlow () is a village and a municipality in Aurich, in Lower Saxony, Germany. It is about 8 km southwest of Aurich,Ihlowerfehnâ€“Aurich on luftlinie.org (German language website) and 15 km east of Emden. ==References== Category:Towns and villages in East Frisia Category:Aurich (district)
